comments:
Build: Callisto 3.2

To reproduce:

1. Install Sleak.

2. Launch WTP.

3. Create a Dynamic Web project

4. Right click on the Web project > properties > Validation

5. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource snap shot

6. Right click on the Web project > properties > Validation

7. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource diff. The following shows up. We should deallocate the color object after the dialog closes.

java.lang.Error
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Device.new_Object(Device.java:753)
	at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color.<init>(Color.java:110)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ui.ValidationPropertiesPage$ValidatorListPage.createPage(ValidationPropertiesPage.java:503)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ui.ValidationPropertiesPage$ValidatorListPage.<init>(ValidationPropertiesPage.java:457)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ui.ValidationPropertiesPage.createContents(ValidationPropertiesPage.java:1176)
	at org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferencePage.createControl(PreferencePage.java:233)
	at org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferenceDialog.createPageControl(PreferenceDialog.java:1403)
